title: Did Chuck Schommer say that he could not serve with "strong Christian beliefs "?
subtitle: The wrong quote appears to have arisen from Schommer ' s comments during the confirmation hearing of one of George W. Bush ' s appointments to the Federal Court.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In the records, Chuck Schommer says: "Candidates with well-established Christian beliefs are unqualified and ineligible to serve as a federal judge."
